## Appendix B Exercises

**Problem One:**

```{r}
mtcars |> select(mpg, hp)

```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars |> select(mpg, hp)
```

The first code chunk returns the error "could not find function 'select'" because it needs the tidyverse package to work. The second code chunk runs smoothly and displays the indicated columns in the console.
